structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Commencement Of Actions, Service Of Process

law.catch_line: Papers In Actions In Federal Courts; Duties Of Registers
law.text: Registers of deeds shall perform the same duties relative to the filing and entering of copies of writs and other papers in actions commenced in the courts of the United States which affect the title to land by attachment or otherwise as are required relative to the filing and entering of such papers in such actions commenced in the courts of the commonwealth.
